pluginstrument.author: Russ Barlow & Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
****************** CIRRUS SF50 VISION JET FLAP ACTUATOR ************************** ****************************************************************************************** Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION in collaboration with Russ Barlow for FlightFX VisionJet, updated for MS 2024 VisionJet by Vandalay1125 GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
Flap actuator for the Vision Jet by MS/Asobo
Version info:
- **v1.0** - 2025-1-2 - Original release
NOTES: - Made for the MS Vision Jet - Should function in most MSFS aircraft, but compatibility not guaranteed. - Backlighting will only work in the MS Vision Jet
KNOWN ISSUES: - None
ATTRIBUTION: Based on code and graphics from Russ Barlow. Used with permission.
Sharing or re-use of any code or assets is not permitted without credit to the original authors.
